mapper.select: select Q.qna_no, Q.space_no, Q.nickname, Q.qna_content, Q.qna_status, Q.qna_Date, Q.qna_answer, Q.member_email from qna Q join space S on Q.space_no=S.space_no where S.member_email=#{hostId} order by Q.qna_date desc
select Q.* from( select * from qna join space on qna.space_no=space.space_no where space.member_email=#{hostId} and qna_answer is null order by qna_date desc ) Q where rownum between 1 and 50

SELECT TO_CHAR(D.settlement_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS settlement_date, S.member_email, D.daily_revenue, d.daily_total_hour FROM daily_sale D join space S on S.space_no=D.space_no WHERE D.settlement_date BETWEEN SYSDATE-30 AND SYSDATE AND S.member_email=#{hostId}
select space_no from reservation where rev_cancle = 0 and to_char(d_day) = to_char(sysdate-1) group by space_no
mapper.insert: insert all into daily_sale values( 'DAY'||seq_daily_sale_no.nextval, space_no, today, result, total ) select max(space_no) space_no, sum(column1-column2) as result, sum(total_price) as total, sysdate-1 as today from ( select space_no, end_hour as column1, start_hour as column2, total_price from reservation where space_no=#{spaceNo} and to_char(d_day) = to_char(sysdate-1) and rev_cancle = 0 )
